title: Coronation Street: Michelle mortifies Steve while planning son's funeral - as Leanne's baby secret gets out
text:

Coronation Street's Michelle Connor is devastated following the loss of her newborn son. 
Last night, she confessed: "I don't want to live in a world without Ruairi in it. I want my boy." 
Next week, viewers will see the Weatherfield favourite run off without telling anybody where she is going as she and husband Steve McDonald start making arrangements for their baby's funeral. 
Luckily, Robert Preston manages to track her down but is shocked to see the state she's in. Steve and Michelle are planning their son's funeral (Photo: ITV) 
In a bid to try and spend some time with his struggling wife, Steve takes Michelle out for lunch at the Bistro - where she turns to alcohol. Read More 
He tries to urge her to slow down but she's having none of, explaining she's not breastfeeding so it doesn't matter. The heartbroken mother gets drunk to help her cope (Photo: ITV) Michelle mortifies Steve by making a VERY public toast to their dead son (Photo: ITV) 
Ridiculously drunk, she then makes a toast in front of the diners to her dead baby. 
Steve is left mortified and Michelle then storms out of the restaurant, bursting into tears. Robert is shocked by the state he finds Michelle in (Photo: ITV) 
Making matters worse for the grieving couple, it looks like it could soon be revealed that Steve is the father of Leanne Battersby's baby. 
Nick Tilsley is stunned after learning that Steve's mum Liz knows he's the dad. 
It then emerges that Peter Barlow is in on the secret too as he threatens Nick that he is going to reveal all. Steve is the father of Leanne's baby (Photo: ITV) 
While Corrie bosses haven't confirmed when the truth will come out, it looks like all will be revealed sooner rater than later as Leanne prepares to give birth.
